```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load}
library(AutoExploreR)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r data}
testdata <- data.frame(A = rnorm(50,0,1),
                         B = runif(50,10,20),
                         C = seq(1,50,1))

getVar <- "A"
```


## Analysis of variable `r getVar`

### Correlations

```{r}
AutoExploreR::targetCorrelations(testdata, getVar)
```

## Visualisations

An interactive histogram and static density estimate plots have been 
generated for variable `r getVar`.

### Interactive histogram plot

```{r message=FALSE}
AutoExploreR::gghistogram(testdata, getVar, interactiveplot = TRUE)
```

### Static density plot

```{r message=FALSE}
AutoExploreR::ggdensity(testdata, getVar, interactiveplot = FALSE)
```
